lead_paragraph: The rehabilitation of Minnesota Vikings quarterback Teddy Bridgewater's left knee will require recovery from multiple ligament reconstruction.

headline.print_headline: Vikings: Surgery Gives Bridgewater Reason to Be 'Optimistic'
